fields.description: One bit per credit throttler; set to load the config from CreditThrottleConfig into the respective credit throttler
fields.name: Config

fields.description: One bit per credit throttler; set to enable the respective credit throttler
fields.name: Run

fields.description: Modifier for Configure: Enables/disables the use of the linear feedback shift register to control the throttling
fields.name: ConfigLfsr

fields.description: Programmable number of cycles for which 'throttle' is de-asserted
fields.name: ThrottleOff

fields.description: Programmable number of cycles for which 'throttle' is asserted
fields.name: ThrottleOn

fields.description: Controls which of 8 outputs are stimulated by the credit throttle; a 1 enables the output
fields.name: ThrottleMask
